title: RAU Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in for 03 Technical Expert Posts
description: The Dr Sarvepalli Radhakrishnan Rajasthan Ayurved University, Jodhpur (RAU Jodhpur) has officially released the notiifcation to fill the vacancies of 03 Technical Expert Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their M. Pharm, M. Sc, and Ph. D. can apply for the RAU Jodhpur Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can attend the walk-in interview. Here we have mentioned th...
